name: Cat Matcher
description:
A cute and simple game about matching cats!
  • Match all of the cats to win!
  • Get bonus points depending on how few flips you make between matches!
  • Share your scores here in the comments!

Cat Matcher was a short project developed during a game jam. It may receive updates in the future.

Cat pictures were sourced from https://thiscatdoesnotexist.com/
Audio samples were sourced form https://freesound.org/

If you have any feedback, ideas, bugs to report, or just want to share a picture of your cat, leave a post in the comments! :)

Recommended specifications:

  • Windows 10
  • 1920 x 1080 (or higher) screen resolution.
